works.description: During the Fuorisalone in Milan (April 12-17, 2011), Architettura Sonora, designer of immersive audio systems, will be presenting its new line of sonic modules that tend to redesign the acoustic perception of space. The unique shape of Architettura Sonora’s architectural sonic modules aims to be acoustically efficient and capable of focusing sound directly into specific areas, thereby combining different sonic modules and their different directional properties to fully redesign the acoustic experience, both indoors and outdoors.
